jmap_delete_emails.description:
Delete emails. Moves to trash or permanently deletes.

    By default moves to Trash. Set permanent=True to delete forever.
    Use jmap_search_emails to find email IDs first.

    Args:
        params: JmapDeleteEmailsInput containing:
            - email_ids: List of email IDs to delete (required)
            - account: Email account (optional)
            - permanent: True for permanent deletion (default False)

    Returns:
        Confirmation of deleted emails.
